meanings.definition: To pile up in a heap
meanings.sent1: He heaps the leaves in the backyard every fall.
meanings.sent2: The workers heap the sand into mounds for construction.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally heaps the clothes on the chair instead of folding them.
meanings.sent4: The chef heaps the ingredients together to make a delicious stew.
meanings.sent5: The snow begins to heap on the ground during a heavy storm.
